scripts.bench:graphlit:locomo: bun run src/index.ts run -p graphlit -b locomo
scripts.bench:graphlit:longmemeval: bun run src/index.ts run -p graphlit -b longmemeval
scripts.bench:graphlit:convomem: bun run src/index.ts run -p graphlit -b convomem
scripts.bench:graphlit:quick: bun run src/index.ts run -p graphlit -b locomo -l 5
scripts.bench:graphlit:small: bun run src/index.ts run -p graphlit -b locomo -l 50 -j gpt-4.1
scripts.bench:graphlit:medium: bun run src/index.ts run -p graphlit -b locomo -l 200
scripts.compare:locomo: bun run src/index.ts compare -p graphlit,supermemory,mem0,zep -b locomo
scripts.compare:longmemeval: bun run src/index.ts compare -p graphlit,supermemory,mem0,zep -b longmemeval
scripts.compare:convomem: bun run src/index.ts compare -p graphlit,supermemory,mem0,zep -b convomem
scripts.compare:quick: bun run src/index.ts compare -p graphlit,supermemory,mem0,zep -b locomo -l 10
scripts.compare:small: bun run src/index.ts compare -p graphlit,supermemory,mem0,zep -b locomo -l 50
scripts.compare:medium: bun run src/index.ts compare -p graphlit,supermemory,mem0,zep -b locomo -l 200
